org.strongback

Interface SwitchReactor


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface SwitchReactor
    A class that allows other components to react to the state of switches. For example, the reactor can be used to submit a command whenever a Gamepad's left trigger button is pressed and submit a different command when the same trigger is released: 
       Gamepad gamepad = ...
   reactor.onTriggered(gamepad.getRightTrigger(),()->Strongback.submit(new FireRepeatedlyCommand()));
   reactor.onUnTriggered(gamepad.getRightTrigger(),()->Strongback.submit(new StopFireCommand()));

    The reactor is threadsafe, meaning functions can be registered even while the reactor is forwarding state and state transitions to the already-registered functions.

    It is not currently possible to remove a function once it has been registered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function that is to be called the moment when the specified Switch is triggered.
      default void onTriggeredSubmit(Switch swtch, Supplier<Command> commandSupplier)
      Submit a Command the moment when the specified Switch is triggered.
      void onUntriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function that is to be called the moment when the specified Switch is untriggered.
      default void onUntriggeredSubmit(Switch swtch, Supplier<Command> commandSupplier)
      Submit a Command the moment when the specified Switch is untriggered.
      void whileTriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function to be called repeatedly whenever the specified Switch is in the triggered state.
      void whileUntriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function to be called repeatedly whenever the specified Switch is not in the triggered state.

    • Method Detail

      • onTriggeredSubmit

        default void onTriggeredSubmit(Switch swtch,
                               Supplier<Command> commandSupplier)
        Submit a Command the moment when the specified Switch is triggered.
        Parameters:
        swtch - the Switch
        commandSupplier - the supplier of the command to submit; may not be null but may return a null command

      • onUntriggeredSubmit

        default void onUntriggeredSubmit(Switch swtch,
                                 Supplier<Command> commandSupplier)
        Submit a Command the moment when the specified Switch is untriggered.
        Parameters:
        swtch - the Switch
        commandSupplier - the supplier of the command to submit; may not be null but may return a null command

      • onTriggered

        void onTriggered(Switch swtch,
                 Runnable function)
        Register a Runnable function that is to be called the moment when the specified Switch is triggered.
        Parameters:
        swtch - the Switch
        function - the function to execute when the switch is triggered

      • onUntriggered

        void onUntriggered(Switch swtch,

        Register a Runnable function that is to be called the moment when the specified Switch is untriggered.
        Parameters:
        swtch - the Switch
        function - the function to execute when the switch is untriggered

      • whileTriggered

        void whileTriggered(Switch swtch,
                    Runnable function)
        Register a Runnable function to be called repeatedly whenever the specified Switch is in the triggered state.
        Parameters:
        swtch - the Switch
        function - the function to execute while the switch remains triggered

      • whileUntriggered

        void whileUntriggered(Switch swtch,
                      Runnable function)
        Register a Runnable function to be called repeatedly whenever the specified Switch is not in the triggered state.
        Parameters:
        swtch - the Switch
        function - the function to execute while the switch remains untriggered
